description: This story humorously explores why Koreans love winter, linking it to their love for 'kim-chilly'.
title: Kim-Chilly Winter
n_1: On a snowy street in Seoul, Jin encounters a unique snowman named Kimchi.
c1_1: It's so cold! How do you stand it?
c2_1: I'm made of kim-chilly, I love the winter!
n_2: Jin laughs, looking at Kimchi's kimchi jar buttons.
c1_2: That's a cool way to stay chilled!
n_3: They share a bowl of steaming hot kimchi stew.
n_4: As snowflakes fall, they enjoy the winter together.
c1_4: Now I get why Koreans love winter!
